description.value:
Sifra has been slowly etching magical sigils into this guantlet. Over time, she has built into it several spells. Treat this gauntlet as a spellstriker gauntlet.

A spellstriker gauntlet is wrought iron with gleaming arcane sigils etched into its surface.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] take 1d6 damage per rank of the spell, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is @Check[will|against:spell|basic] instead of Reflex.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{Telekinetic Projectile}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8lZhUreL1bRk1v4Z]{Briny Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{Blur}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{Telekinetic Maneuver}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TDaMnCtZ72uyYrz8]{Blink Charge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCLyETFoPqCQXLVy]{Flowing Strike}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

Craft Requirements You have the magus's Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.

Sonorous - Sounds a pure tone when struck.
The nature of this gauntlet is unclear.
